Text:
Pretty amateurish cam.  Trouble with position, focus, and zoom for at least the first 10mins.  Is quite annoying.  The whole screen isn't in view most of the movie, but the sound is good, and the movie is watchable, although a bit dark and blurry in some scenes.  To be expected though I suppose.  There is quite a bit of noise from him fiddling with the camera, then heaps of audience noise the last 20mins or so.  Clapping, laughing, talking loudly.
Like I said, it's annoying, but watchable.
